633:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārthaṃ trayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ|
633:4: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat|
633:5: atha khalu bhagavān śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdatprajñapta evāsane paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhīṃ smṛtimupasthāpya|
633:6: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāman|
633:7: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirabhivandya bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdan||1||
633:8: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhutistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ|
633:9: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat- āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
633:11: yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa|
633:12: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parīnditāḥ paramayā parīndanayā|
633:13: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam ?
633:14: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat- sādhu sādhu subhūte,
633:20: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
633:21: bhāṣiṣye'haṃ te-yathā bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyaṃ yathā pratipattavyaṃ yathā cittaṃ pragrahītavyam|
633:23: bhagavānasyaitadavocat-iha subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitenaiva cittamutpādayitavyam-yāvantaḥ subhūte sattvāḥ sattvadhātau sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītā aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñino vā,
633:25: te ca mayā sarve'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ|
633:26: evamaparimāṇānapi sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati|
633:31: na sa subhūte bodhisattvo vaktavyo yasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta,
633:33: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute na bodhisattvena vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam,
633:37: evaṃ hi sūbhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet|
633:40: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇāmudgrahītum|
633:41: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum ?
633:43: bhagavānāha- evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu adha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu samantāddaśasu dikṣu sukaramākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum ?
633:45: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti,
633:46: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum|
633:47: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet||4||
633:48: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ?
633:52: yā sā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat|
633:53: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat yāvatsubhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanmṛṣā,
633:54: yāvadalakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanna mṛṣeti hi lakṣaṇālakṣaṇatastathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ||5||
633:56: kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne,
633:58: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne guṇavantaḥ śīlavantaḥ prajñāvantaśca bhaviṣyanti,
633:60: na khalu punaste subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti,
633:62: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitā anekabuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
633:63: ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu ekacittaprasādamapi pratilapsyante|
633:67: sarve te subhūte aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti|
633:69: na hi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmātmasaṃjñā pravartate,
633:73: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartate|
633:75: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartate|
633:77: sacetsubhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
633:84: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharma udgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ|
633:85: tasmādiyaṃ tathāgatena saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā-kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyamājānadbhidharmā eva prahātavyāḥ prāgevādharmā iti||6||
633:86: punaraparaṃ bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte,
633:89: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
633:90: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirityabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
633:98: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
633:99: api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt|
633:101: bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt|
633:106: bhagavānāha-yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
633:107: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo vistareṇa deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
633:110: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
633:113: buddhadharmā buddhadharmā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ|
633:115: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati-mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
633:121: na rūpamāpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān dharmānāpannaḥ|
633:123: sacedbhagavan srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavet- mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti,
633:126: bhagavānāha- takiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati-mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti ?
633:128: sa sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati-mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti|
633:130: na hi sa kaściddharmo yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvamāpannaḥ|
633:132: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati-mayānāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti ?
633:134: na anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati-mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti|
633:136: na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo'nāgāmitvamāpannaḥ|
633:138: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu arhata evaṃ bhavati-mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti ?
633:142: na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo'rhannāma|
633:144: sacedbhagavan arhata evaṃ bhavet-mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
633:150: na ca me bhagavannevaṃ bhavati- arhannasmyahaṃ vītarāga iti|
633:152: na māṃ tathāgato vyākariṣyadaraṇāvihāriṇāmagryaḥ subhūtiḥ kulaputro na kvacidviharati,
633:154: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhata-samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ ?
633:156: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ||
633:157: bhagavānāha-yaḥ kaścitsubhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet-ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
633:160: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ|
633:162: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam|
633:164: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyo yattasyaivaṃ rūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ|
633:165: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet ?
633:169: ātmabhāva ātmabhāva iti bhagavan na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ|
633:171: na hi bhagavan sa bhāvo nābhāvaḥ|
633:173: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāstāvatya eva gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ ?
633:176: subhūtirāha-tā eva tāvadbhagavan bahvayo gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ,
633:180: yāvatyastāsu gaṅgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyustāvato lokadhātūn kaścideva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnaparipurṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
633:181: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt ?
633:183: bahu sugata strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam|
633:184: bhagavānāha- yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā tāvato lokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
633:185: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
633:187: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya bhāṣyeta vā saṃprakāśyeta vā,
633:189: kaḥ punarvādo ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
633:191: parameṇa te subhūte āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti|
633:192: tasmiṃśca subhūte pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ||12||
633:193: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-ko nāma ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
633:195: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat- prajñāpāramitā nāmāyaṃ subhūte dharmaparyāyaḥ|
633:201: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ?
633:204: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit,
633:215: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho draṣṭavyaḥ ?
633:219: yāni hi tāni bhagavan dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni,
633:222: bhagavānāha-yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā dine dine gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
633:224: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhyaparebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
633:232: na mayā bhagavan jātvevaṃrūpo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ|
633:233: parameṇa te bhagavan āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti,
633:234: ye iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti|
633:239: na mama bhagavan āścaryaṃ yadahamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavakalpayāmi adhimucye|
633:240: ye'pi te bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
633:241: ye imaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
633:244: api tu khalu punarbhagavan na teṣāmātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
633:245: na sattvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
633:256: ye iha subhūte sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante|
633:259: yāṃ ca subhūte tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate,
633:262: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā,
633:266: nāsīnme tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā sattvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā,
633:267: nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā vā asaṃjñā vā babhūva|
633:269: sacenme subhūte tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā abhaviṣyat,
633:274: abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte atīte'dhvani pañca jātiśatāni yadahaṃ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūvam|
633:279: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitavyam|
633:287: tasmādeva tathāgato bhāṣate-apratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam|
633:289: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena evaṃrūpo dānaparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya|
633:293: ya evaṃ te sarvasattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāsta eva asattvāḥ|
633:298: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yastathāgatena dharmo'bhisaṃbuddho deśito nidhyātaḥ,
633:300: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo'ndhakārapraviṣṭo na kiṃcidapi paśyet,
633:301: evaṃ vastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati|
633:302: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sūrye'bhyudgate nānavidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet,
633:303: evamavastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo'vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati||
633:304: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
633:309: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti||14||
633:310: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā purvāhṇakālasamaye gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
633:318: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo'tulyo'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ|
633:319: ayaṃ ca subhūte dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣito'grayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya,
633:321: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
633:326: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhenāṃ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti|
633:328: sarve te subhūte sattvāḥ samāṃśena bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyanti vacayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti|
633:330: na hi śakyaṃ subhūte ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hīnādhimuktiakaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrotum,
633:332: nābodhisattvapratijñai sattvaiḥ śakyamayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotuṃ vā udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā|
633:334: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ prakaśayiṣyate,
633:335: pūjanīyaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya|
633:338: api tu ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
633:344: yāni ca teṣāṃ subhūte sattvānāṃ paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṛtānyapāyasaṃvartanīyāni,
633:345: dṛṣṭa eva dharme paribhūtatayā tāni paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṣapayiṣyanti,
633:347: abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte atīte'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairdīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pareṇa paratareṇa caturaśītibuddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan ye mayārāgitāḥ,
633:349: yacca mayā subhūte te buddhā bhagavanta ārāgitāḥ,
633:351: yacca paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
633:353: asya khalu punaḥ subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāntikādasau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
633:354: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭimamipi koṭiśatatamīmapi koṭiśatasahasratamīmapi koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi|
633:355: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniṣadamapi yāvadaupamyamapi na kṣamate||
633:356: sacetpunaḥ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā ahaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣeyam,
633:357: yāvatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti,
633:360: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo'tulyo'yaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ|
633:362: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyam,
633:365: bhagavānāha-iha subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-sarve sattvā mayā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ|
633:366: evaṃ sa sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati|
633:373: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthito nāma||
633:374: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ ?
633:375: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat- yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
633:376: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ|
633:378: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ|
633:380: na māṃ dīpaṃkarastathāgato vyākariṣyat-bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti|
633:381: yasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
633:382: tasmādahaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatena vyākṛta- bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha|
633:390: yaḥ kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet-tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti,
633:394: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ|
633:395: yaśca subhūte tathāgatena dharmo'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā tatra na satyaṃ na mṛṣā|
633:400: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyaḥ ?
633:401: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha- yo'sau bhagavaṃstathāgatena puruṣo bhāṣita upetakāyo mahākāya iti,
633:405: yo bodhisattva evaṃ vadet-ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmiti,
633:408: asti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo nāma ?
633:410: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo nāma|
633:411: bhagavānāha- sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte asattvāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ,
633:413: tasmāttathāgato bhāṣate-nirātmānaḥ sarvadharmā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpudgalāḥ sarvadharmā iti||
633:414: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet- ahaṃ kṣetravyūhānniṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
633:417: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ|
633:419: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo nirātmāno dharmā nirātmāno dharmā ityadhimucyate,
633:424: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ ?
633:427: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ ?
633:430: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya dharmacakṣuḥ ?
633:433: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya buddhacakṣuḥ ?
633:436: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
633:441: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
633:452: cittadhārā cittadhāreti subhūte adhāraiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
633:458: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
633:459: api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt ?
633:463: bahu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam|
633:465: puṇyaskandhaḥ puṇyaskandha iti subhūte askandhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ|
633:469: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ?
633:473: rūpakāyapariniṣpattī rūpakāyapariniṣpattiriti bhagavan apariniṣpattireṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā|
633:475: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ?
633:482: bhagavānāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati-mayā dharmo deśita iti ?
633:483: subhūtirāha-no hīdaṃ bhagavan tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati-mayā dharmo deśita iti|
633:484: bhagavānāha-yaḥ subhūte evaṃ vadet- tathāgatena dharmo deśita iti,
633:488: dharmadeśanā dharmadeśaneti subhūte nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo dharmadeśanā nāmopalabhyate||
633:489: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-asti bhagavan kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
633:491: bhagavānāha- na te subhūte sattvā nāsattvāḥ|
633:493: sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte sarve te subhūte asattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ|
633:495: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu asti sa kaściddharmaḥ,
633:498: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ|
633:500: aṇurapi tatra dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate|
633:502: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte samaḥ sa dharmo na tatra kaścidviṣamaḥ|
633:504: nirātmatvena niḥsattvatvena nirjīvatvena niṣpudgalatvena samā sā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaiḥ kuśalairdharmairabhisaṃbudhyate|
633:506: kuśalā dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā iti subhūte adharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ|
633:508: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhute strī vā puruṣo vā yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravaḥ parvatarājānaḥ,
633:509: tāvato rāśīn saptānāṃ ratnānāmabhisaṃhṛtya tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
633:510: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet,
633:511: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
633:513: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati-mayā sattvāḥ parimocitā iti?
633:514: na khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam|
633:517: yadi punaḥ subhūte kaścitsattvo'bhaviṣyadyastathāgatena parimocitaḥ syāt,
633:520: ātmagrāha iti subhūte agrāha eṣa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ|
633:522: bālapṛthagjanā iti subhūte ajanā eva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ|
633:538: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata-
633:539: ye māṃ rūpeṇa cādrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa cānvaguḥ|
633:540: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ||1||
633:541: dharmato buddho draṣṭavyo dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ|
633:542: dharmatā ca na vijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum||2||26||
633:543: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā?
633:544: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam|
633:546: na hi subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā syāt|
633:547: na khalu punaste subhūte kaścidevaṃ vadet-bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñaptaḥ ucchedo veti|
633:548: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam|
633:550: na bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñapto nocchedaḥ||27||
633:551: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
633:552: yaśca bodhisattvo nirātmakeṣvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
633:554: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ|
633:555: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha- nanu bhagavan bodhisattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ ?
633:558: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścidevaṃ vadet-tathāgato gacchati vā āgacchati vā tiṣṭhati vā niṣīdati vā,
633:563: tathāgata iti subhūte ucyate na kvacidgato na kutaścidāgataḥ|
633:565: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanti trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajāṃsi,
633:566: tāvatāṃ lokadhātūnāmevaṃrūpaṃ maṣiṃ kuryāt yāvadevamasaṃkhyeyena vīryeṇa tadyathāpi nāma paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ,
633:567: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusaṃcayo bhavet ?
633:591: yo hi kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet-ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā,
633:593: api nu sa subhūte samyagvadamāno vadet ?
633:601: bhagavānāha-evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sarvadharmā jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ|
633:605: dharmasaṃjñā dharmasaṃjñeti subhūte asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā|
633:607: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'prameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
633:608: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya dhārayeddeśayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt,
633:614: svapnaṃ ca vidyudabhraṃ ca evaṃ draṣṭavya saṃskṛtam||
633:618: sthavirasubhūtiste ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti||32||
